title: Transaction flow filters
description: Add min-amount and channel filters for Sankey flow visualization in transaction tracing.

title: Claude agent SDK integration + skill scaffolding
description: Add agents/ scaffolding with base agent interface, Claude placeholder, and skill modules for entity research, transactions, network mapping, reporting, anomaly detection.

title: RPG-style UI layer (quests, skills, scoring)
description: Add Streamlit RPG elements (quest board, skill tree, investigator levels) layered on existing UI for demo/training.

title: Transaction parsing + fund tracing tools
description: Add transaction parsing + flow tracing utilities (CSV parsing, anomaly heuristics, flow graph builder) and sample datasets for demos.

title: Compliance reporting (SAR) + sanctions/PEP enhancements
description: Implement SAR report generation templates, add enhanced sanctions/PEP screening with fuzzy matching and placeholder integrations.

title: Transaction flow visualization
description: Add Sankey-style flow visualization to transaction tracing page for quick path inspection.

title: Live transactions template
description: Add data/transactions.csv template and document CLI live mode usage.

title: Mock laundering cases + agent test harness
description: Add a lightweight agent-style harness script to run mock cases through enrichment/scoring and transaction tracing.

title: Charm-based CLI prototype
description: Add a minimal Charm (Bubble Tea + Lip Gloss) TUI for a quick terminal snapshot.

title: Beneficial ownership enrichment + laundering risk flags
description: Add beneficial ownership enrichment (OpenCorporates+GLEIF/LEI placeholders) and extend risk scoring with laundering flags (opacity, high-risk jurisdictions, rapid-change ownership).

title: Charm CLI dataset counts
description: Surface dataset counts (SEC enforcement, OFAC names) in the Charm TUI.
